text: Alex Meret (; born 22 March 1997) is an Italian footballer. He plays as a goalkeeper for Serie A club S.S.C. Napoli and the Italy national team. ==References== Category:Italian association football goalkeepers Category:Footballers from Friuli-Venezia Giulia Category:Sportspeople from Udine Category:1997 births Category:Living people
title: Alex Meret
